text: Ladyhawke is a 1985 American Italian fantasy movie directed by Richard Donner and starring Michelle Pfeiffer, Matthew Broderick, Rutger Hauer, John Wood, Ken Hutchison, Leo McKern. It was distributed by 20th Century Fox and Warner Bros.. It was nominated for 2 Academy Awards in 1986. ==Other websites== * * Ladyhawke at Movie Review Query Engine * * Category:1985 fantasy movies Category:American fantasy movies Category:Italian fantasy movies Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Warner Bros. movies Category:Movies set in Italy Category:Movies set in castles Category:Movies about birds Category:Movies directed by Richard Donner Category:Movies set in the 13th century
title: Ladyhawke
